[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@primitivefi/rmm-sdk](./rmm-sdk.md) &gt; [ICalibration](./rmm-sdk.icalibration.md)

## ICalibration interface

Calibration Struct; Class representation of each Curve's parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICalibration 
```

## Remarks

Can be stateless and used to compute poolId of arbitrary parameters.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [gamma](./rmm-sdk.icalibration.gamma.md) | Percentage | Gamma, equal to 1 - fee %, as a Percentage instance with 4 precision. |
|  [maturity](./rmm-sdk.icalibration.maturity.md) | Time | Time class with a raw value in seconds. |
|  [poolId](./rmm-sdk.icalibration.poolid.md) | string | Computes deterministic poolIds from hashing engine address and calibration parameters. |
|  [sigma](./rmm-sdk.icalibration.sigma.md) | Percentage | Volatility as a Percentage instance with 4 precision. |
|  [strike](./rmm-sdk.icalibration.strike.md) | Wei | Strike price with the same precision as the stable asset. |
